tool_description: **Real-time** LinkedIn Company data based on Numeric ID, Domain or URL. **Really working now 2023**. Scalable API.
title: Fresh LinkedIn Company Data

api_list.name: Get Company by Domain
api_list.description: Given a company’s web domain, the API will return valuable data points in JSON format.

api_list.name: Get Company Data by Its LinkedIn Internal ID
api_list.description: Given a company’s LinkedIn internal ID, the API will return valuable data points in JSON format.

api_list.name: Get Company Data by LinkedIn URL
api_list.description: Given a company’s LinkedIn URL, the API will return valuable data points in JSON format.

api_list.name: Get Company Ads Count
api_list.description: Get number of ads the company posted on LinkedIn. 1 request = 1 credit.

api_list.name: Get Company Jobs Count
api_list.description: Get number of opening jobs the company posted on LinkedIn. 1 request = 1 credit.
